genre_description: An alternate history Western that integrates anachronistic AI medical technology into a gritty Civil War setting.

ai_characters.name: AI medical assistant
ai_characters.description: A clinical, voice-activated medical system integrated into a desert mission infirmary to assist with complex surgeries and diagnostics.

behaviors.description: The AI medical assistant activates upon request, initiates emergency medical protocols, and performs diagnostic sequences to treat a critically wounded patient.
behaviors.quote: The AI's voice, when it came, was calm and clinical—a strange contrast to the ancient mission's rough-hewn atmosphere. 'Medical emergency protocol initiated. Please state the nature of the patient's condition.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character functions as a 'silicon morality play' element by providing impartial, benevolent medical aid in a narrative otherwise dominated by human greed and violence. Its behavior is perfectly aligned with its humanitarian purpose, and the narrative frames its high-tech intervention as a 'miraculous' contrast to the brutality of the era, successfully modeling positive AI alignment.
